code: import{useSelector,useDispatch}from"react-redux";import classes from"./Counter.module.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Counter=()=>{const dispatch=useDispatch();const counter=useSelector(state=>state.counter);const show=useSelector(state=>state.showCounter);const incrementHandler=()=>{dispatch({type:"increment"});};const increaseHandler=()=>{dispatch({type:"increase",amount:5});};const decrementHandler=()=>{dispatch({type:"decrement"});};const toggleCounterHandler=()=>{dispatch({type:"toggle"});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("main",{className:classes.counter,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Redux Counter"}),show&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:classes.value,children:counter}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:incrementHandler,children:"Increment"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:increaseHandler,children:"Increase by 5"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:decrementHandler,children:"Decrement"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:toggleCounterHandler,children:"Toggle Counter"})]});};export default Counter;
